scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Lynn
scrape.text: What a fabulous read!To start any book with a quote from Reservoir Dogs you know immeadiately that you're in for a cracking read. Aperitif, where any good meal should start sets the scene for our evening with two brothers and their wives. A decision to discuss their children, who at fifteen may have created an untenable situation for both families. Over the course of the meal polite conversation becomes darkly funny with a hint of unspoken tension. Beautifully crafted, emotional and fraught with family loyalties. How far would any parent really go to protect their Children? Questions posed and ultimately answered, The Dinner will leave you feeling more than satisfied!
